column2:
"Ah, Leader. How are you doing?
...What's wrong? You have an odd look on your face. Is there something strange about my appearance?"
"Hehe, it feels weird to have Khorshid here on the ARKS Ship, doesn't it?"
"It's just as weird for me. It's not so long ago that I wouldn't have dreamed of spending any time in a place like this..."
"If I hadn't met you and Gene, I would never have even heard of ARKS, or known all the things you do."

"I had something to ask you, but...
It can wait. Speak to me whenever you're ready to hear it."
"You ARKS have a lot of customs with no parallels in Erzimarut culture. Very interesting."

"Akhtar came here before? Hmm...
I can't see any sign of her anywhere."
"You ARKS have all sorts of clothes. Look at that woman there. Her outfit is both fashionable and cute."

"That could look good on Akhtar.
She's worn the same clothes ever since she became a Darknix."
"I think it would look good on you too, Khorshid. Oh... maybe it would be a little tight around the chest..."
"You're one to talk, Gene. Honestly. Perhaps I'd be able to wear clothes like yours, then."
"I wanted to go on a mission, if possible... But when I transform, I spread Darker Factor around me."

"If I transformed, I might be mistaken for a hostile.
...I want to avoid looking suspicious."
"...Still, being cooped up and unable to fight is grating. I hate having to ask for your help.."
"I think there are more ARKS starting conversations with me than there were before."
"It used to be that they didn't dare approach me. Perhaps dealing with my stress has made me less tense."
"All thanks to you and Gene. It's important that cultural exchanges like this are fun. Heheh, thank you, Leader."
"It's been a long time, Leader. You're looking well."
"My sister, Akhtar, and I have come to visit the ARKS Ship together. I hate to impose on you, but please take care of us both."
"Akhtar's been missing you, you know. Be sure to stop by and talk to her."
"There are very few visible differences between the Darknix bodies we use for battle and the living bodies we use for everyday life."

"Of course, an Erzimarut would pick up on those differences right away...
What about you ARKS?"
"Well, Leader? Which body do you think I'm using right now?"
"Hey, Leader. Do you think Akhtar's face has got a little rounder lately?"
"...Really? I'm sure she's been eating more ever since she got here."
"I'll have to take her down to the training room to burn off some of that fat later."
"Phew, desk work makes my shoulders ache."

"I'll have to ask Akhtar for a shoulder massage later.
...You wouldn't happen to know how to give a shoulder massage, would you?"
"The number of ARKS coming to help us with our reconstruction work has greatly increased lately."
"It's all thanks to you and Gene offering to help. We're deeply indebted to you."

"The reconstruction still has a long way to go, but...
With you on our side, all my worries are assuaged. We're counting on you, Leader."
